data.lyric:
[ti:Famous]
[ar:Mason Ramsey]
[al:Famous]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Famous - Mason Ramsey (梅森拉姆齐)
[00:06.47]Written by：Tyler Hubbard/Sarah Buxton/Canaan Smith/Corey Crowder
[00:12.95]Don't get me wrong it's pretty cool to be on TV
[00:16.55]So all the folks back home can see me
[00:19.46]And that I'm livin' it out
[00:20.99]All the things I used to dream about
[00:23.42]
[00:24.49]Yeah it's pretty great singing on a stage
[00:27.37]Proud 'cause there ain't an empty seat in the place
[00:30.01]
[00:30.86]But girl ever since I met you
[00:32.95]I got a whole new perspective
[00:35.20]If I'm gonna be famous for something
[00:38.51]I wanna be famous for loving you
[00:43.07]If I'm gonna be known around the world
[00:45.63]
[00:46.19]I wanna because of you girl
[00:48.86]Nothing wrong with the center of attention
[00:51.81]Long as I'm with you I don't mind the pictures
[00:54.69]If I'm gonna be famous for something
[00:57.71]Girl I wanna be famous for loving you
[01:00.75]
[01:05.06]Famous for loving you
[01:10.50]
[01:13.04]Yeah I hope the first question people ask me
[01:16.40]Is How's your girl and how's your family
[01:19.36]I could go on and on and on
[01:22.15]Talkin' 'bout you for days
[01:24.09]
[01:24.85]You can bet when I hear Congratulations
[01:28.47]Want it to be because we made it
[01:31.37]Another five years
[01:33.15]Best thing I got is right here
[01:35.29]If I'm gonna be famous for something
[01:38.52]I wanna be famous for loving you
[01:42.86]If I'm gonna be known around the world
[01:46.20]I wanna because of you girl
[01:48.80]Nothing wrong with the center of attention
[01:51.67]Long as I'm with you I don't mind the pictures
[01:54.75]If I'm gonna be famous for something
[01:57.73]Girl I wanna be famous for loving you
[02:01.68]Ooh famous for loving you
[02:08.07]Ooh
[02:10.57]
[02:11.59]If I'm gonna be famous for something
[02:14.46]I wanna be famous for loving you
[02:19.06]If I'm gonna be known around the world
[02:22.17]I wanna because of you girl
[02:24.81]And if I'm gonna go down in history
[02:27.95]I hope it's all 'cause of you and me
[02:30.96]If I'm gonna be famous for something
[02:33.76]Girl I wanna be famous for loving you
[02:37.36]
[02:41.02]Famous for loving you
[02:46.16]
[02:46.98]Famous for loving you
data.trans:
[ti:Famous]
[ar:Mason Ramsey]
[al:Famous]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.47]//
[00:12.95]别误会我 上电视的感觉很酷
[00:16.55]所以亲朋好友都来家里看我
[00:19.46]我正在实现着
[00:20.99]曾经梦想的一切
[00:23.42]
[00:24.49]站在舞台上唱歌 感觉非常棒
[00:27.37]我很自豪 因为台下挤满了人
[00:30.01]
[00:30.86]但是女孩 自从遇见你
[00:32.95]我有了新的想法
[00:35.20]如果我可以因某事而出名
[00:38.51]我想要因爱你而出名
[00:43.07]如果我可以红遍全球
[00:45.63]
[00:46.19]我想要因你而这样 女孩
[00:48.86]得到关注并没有什么问题
[00:51.81]只要和你在一起 我不在乎其他
[00:54.69]如果我可以因某事而出名
[00:57.71]女孩 我想要因爱你而出名
[01:00.75]
[01:05.06]因爱你而出名
[01:10.50]
[01:13.04]我希望人们问我的第一个问题是
[01:16.40]你的女孩和你的家人怎么样
[01:19.36]我可以几天几夜
[01:22.15]讲关于你的事情
[01:24.09]
[01:24.85]我会听到别人对我说恭喜
[01:28.47]因为我们终于成功了
[01:31.37]再过五年
[01:33.15]我所拥有最棒的东西就是你
[01:35.29]如果我可以因某事而出名
[01:38.52]我想要因爱你而出名
[01:42.86]如果我可以红遍全球
[01:46.20]我想要因你而这样 女孩
[01:48.80]得到关注并没有什么问题
[01:51.67]只要和你在一起 我不在乎其他
[01:54.75]如果我可以因某事而出名
[01:57.73]女孩 我想要因爱你而出名
[02:01.68]因爱你而出名
[02:08.07]//
[02:10.57]
[02:11.59]如果我可以因某事而出名
[02:14.46]我想要因爱你而出名
[02:19.06]如果我可以红遍全球
[02:22.17]我想要因你而这样 女孩
[02:24.81]如果我可以名垂青史
[02:27.95]多希望是因为你和我
[02:30.96]如果我可以因某事而出名
[02:33.76]女孩 我想要因爱你而出名
[02:37.36]
[02:41.02]因爱你而出名
[02:46.16]
[02:46.98]因爱你而出名
